feed.title: TaxHacker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for TaxHacker:
entry.content:
• Backup + restore is finally working

NEXT RELEASE WILL CONTAIN A BREKING CHANGE! PLS UPGRADE TO THIS RELEASE TO BE ABLE TO BACKUP AND THEN RESTORE YOUR DATA

entry.title: New release for TaxHacker:
entry.content:
BREAKING CHANGES: Backup your data in Settings -> Backups before upgrading from v0.3.0!

Here's a step by step guide: https://github.com/vas3k/TaxHacker/blob/main/docs/migrate-0.3-0.5.md

Main features: - Moved DB to Postgres - Auth and multi-user support - New app structure - Easier configuration and auto-login for self hosted mode - Robust backup + restore

entry.title: New release for TaxHacker:
entry.content:
• Invoice Generator
  • Business Details in settings
  • Different plans and limits for users (Cloud Version)
  • Bugfixes

entry.title: New release for TaxHacker: v0.6.0
entry.content:
• Custom LLM support: OpenAI, Google Gemini, Mistral
  • Item detection: parse individual items and split invoice into different transaction if needed
  • "Analyze all" button
  • Design and UX improvements
  • Bugfixes: auth session expiration, file parsing, transaction export
